text: There is no better medicine to heal so many wounds than a heart capable of mercy.

text: Every life counts: from the beginning to the end, from conception to natural death

text: The Gospel message is a source of joy: a joy that spreads from generation to generation and which we inherit.

text: We pray to God for the courage to ask forgiveness and to learn how to listen to what he is saying to us.

text: I ask you to accompany me on my journey to Chile and Peru in your prayers.

text: We should work to accommodate, to protect, to promote and to integrate whoever is forced to leave their own home and undergo moments of real difficulty. @M_RSection

text: We must not wait to be perfect before responding to the Lord who calls us, but rather open our hearts to His voice.

text: The encounter with God and our brothers and sisters cannot wait just because we are slow or lazy. We are called to that encounter today!

text: If we fail to suffer with those who suffer, even those of different religions, languages or cultures, we need to question our own humanity.

text: The more we are rooted in Christ, the more we rediscover interior peace, even in the midst of daily challenges.

text: Joy, prayer and gratitude are three ways that help us live authentically.

text: Let us share the joy of our Christian brothers and sisters of the East who are celebrating Christmas today.

text: Like the Magi, believers are led by faith to seek God in the most hidden places, knowing that the Lord waits for them there.

text: God became a child to be closer to the men and women of every time, and to show us His infinite tenderness.

text: In the name of Jesus, with our witness, we can prove that peace is possible.

text: In the simplicity of the nativity scene we encounter and contemplate the tenderness of God which reveals itself in the Baby Jesus.

text: Let us nurture the seeds of peace as they grow and let us transform our cities into workshops of peace.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Family is the harmonious union of differences between a man and a woman. When it’s open to life and to others it’s even more authentic.

text: During these days let us give space to attitudes and gestures that favour peace.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Modesty is a virtue that is essential for anyone who wants to be like Jesus, who is meek and humble of heart.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Today we pray for all the children who are not allowed to be born, who cry with hunger, who hold weapons in their hands instead of toys.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: God is in love with us. He draws us to Him with tenderness by being born poor and fragile among us, like one of us.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Today we want to remember all those who suffer persecution. We want to be close to them with our affection and our prayers.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Stop and look at the nativity scene: let us enter the true spirit of Christmas with the shepherds, bringing Baby Jesus all that we are.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Contemplating the Baby Jesus, with His humble and infinite love, let us say to Him, very simply: “Thank you for doing all this for me!”
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: If we really want to celebrate Christmas, let’s contemplate this image: the fragile simplicity of a new-born baby. That’s where God is.

text: Let us free Christmas from the worldliness that has taken it hostage! The true spirit of Christmas is the beauty of being loved by God.

text: Without love, both life and faith are worthless.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Heaven doesn’t value what you have, but what you give.

text: Go out to meet Jesus, spend time with Him in prayer, and entrust your whole life to His merciful love.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Every stranger that knocks at our door is an opportunity to meet Jesus Christ.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May the Lord grant us the wisdom to seek that which is worthwhile and to love, not with our words but with our actions.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We become holy when we work for others. When we do so, we continue the creative action of God in history.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Even if there were no one else left to remember us, Jesus would always be there at our side.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I encourage all of you to live the joy of your mission by witnessing to the Gospel wherever you are called to live and work.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christians are called to work concretely in the realities of this world, illuminating them with the light that comes from God.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Thank you for following @Pontifex which turns five years old today. May social media always be spaces that are rich in humanity!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We ask for the grace to make our faith more and more operative through acts of charity.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Political activity must truly be conducted at the service of the human person, with respect for creation and for the common good.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We must fight corruption with determination. It is an evil based on the worship of money and it offends human dignity.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May the Virgin Mary always be our refuge, our consolation, and the way that leads to Christ.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We all possess God-given talents. No one can claim to be so poor that they have nothing to offer others.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: No child of God can be discarded in His eyes. He entrusts a mission to each one of us.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We are all beggars before the love of God, a love that gives meaning to our existence and that offers us eternal life.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Faith becomes tangible when it finds its expression in love and, especially, in the service of our brothers and sisters in difficulty.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Every person is unique and unrepeatable. Let us ensure the disabled are always welcomed by the communities in which they live.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear friends in Myanmar and Bangladesh, thank you for your welcome! Upon you I invoke divine blessings of harmony and peace.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May the wisdom of God help us to know how to welcome and accept those who think and act differently from us.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How much openness is needed to welcome people who feel alone and confused as they search for a meaning in life!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The most holy name of God can never be invoked to justify hatred and violence against other human beings.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The love of Christ is like a “spiritual GPS” that guides us unerringly towards God and towards the heart of our neighbor.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I want my visit to embrace all the people of Myanmar and to encourage the building of an inclusive society.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us look to Jesus today and say to Him in our hearts: "Remember me, Lord, now that you are in your Kingdom!"
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: As I prepare to visit Myanmar and Bangladesh, I wish to send a message of greeting and friendship to everyone. I can't wait to meet you!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: There is also hope for those who have done wrong. Jesus came for this: it is possible to be reconciled with God and begin a new life.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: At the end of time, when the Lord comes to meet us, our joy will be immense. We live in anticipation of this encounter!

text: When we encounter others, do we bring them the warmth of charity or do we stay closed up and warm only ourselves before our fireplace?
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May Mary's pure and simple smile be a source of joy for each one of us as we face life’s difficulties.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us work together to ensure that children continue to smile: their faces serene, filled with joy and hope. #WorldChildrensDay
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: On this day, I invite the entire Church to keep its gaze fixed on those who hold out their hands asking for our solidarity.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Without the support of the prayers of the faithful, the Successor of Peter cannot fulfill his mission in the world. I am counting on you too!

text: We need to encounter the poor and learn how to share so that it becomes a way of life.

text: Poverty is not an accident. It has causes that must be recognized and removed for the good of so many of our brothers and sisters.

text: Faith is a great life companion, allowing us to feel the presence of a Father who never leaves His creatures alone.

text: Nothing and nobody can block the light that Christ puts in our hearts and on the face of His friends.

text: We cannot change the world alone, but together we can spread the joy of the Gospel by staying close to those most in need.

text: Let us remember in our prayers all those who, with dedication and spirit of sacrifice, care for those who are ill.

text: May a culture of encounter always be promoted that is able to bring down the walls which still divide the world.

text: To live as true children of God means to love our neighbour and to be close to those who are lonely and in difficulty.

text: Jesus, help us to love God as Father and our neighbour as ourselves.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May Saints Peter and Paul bless the city of Rome and the entire pilgrim Church throughout the world.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To be friends with God means to pray with simplicity, like children talking to their parents.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: In the face of life’s difficulties, let us ask the Lord for the strength to remain joyful witnesses to our faith.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The family is essential to sustaining human and social development.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How I wish everyone had decent work!  It is essential for human dignity.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for the Christian communities in the Middle East, that they may continue to live in the land where Christianity was born.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: There is so much indifference in the face of suffering.  May we overcome indifference with concrete acts of charity.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: There is never a reason to lose hope.  Jesus says: “I am with you until the end of the world”.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Sometimes we cast the elderly aside, but they are a precious treasure: to cast them aside is an injustice and an irreparable loss.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May the Lord bless the family and strengthen it in this moment of crisis.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We run the risk of forgetting the suffering which doesn’t affect us personally.  May we respond to it, and may we pray for peace in Syria.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May we not resist the Holy Spirit but allow him to work in our lives, so that he can renew us, the Church and the world.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I wish everyone a wonderful World Cup, played in a spirit of true fraternity.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for all victims of sexual violence in conflict, and those working to end this crime. #TimeToAct
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May we never talk about others behind their backs, but speak to them openly about what we think.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I ask all people of good will to join us today in praying for peace in the Middle East. #weprayforpeace
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Prayer is all-powerful. Let us use it to bring peace to the Middle East and peace to the world. #weprayforpeace
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Peace is a gift of God, but requires our efforts. Let us be people of peace in prayer and deed. #weprayforpeace
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Like the Good Samaritan, may we not be ashamed of touching the wounds of those who suffer, but try to heal them with concrete acts of love.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Thank you to all teachers: educating is an important mission, which draws young people to what is good, beautiful and true.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: At times we can be self-absorbed.  Lord, help us to open our hearts to others and to serve those who are most vulnerable.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: In the difficult moments of life, Christians can turn to the Mother of God and find protection and care.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Every Christian can witness to God in the workplace, not only with words, but above all with an honest life.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May we enter into true friendship with Jesus, so that following him closely, we may live with and for him.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear friends, please pray for me during my pilgrimage to the Holy Land.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To live by faith means to put our lives in the hands of God, especially in our most difficult moments.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We will never be disillusioned or lose our way if we are guided by God.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I ask all of you to pray for the victims of the floods in Bosnia and Herzegovina, in Serbia and in other countries in the region.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Come, Holy Spirit!  Help us to overcome our selfishness.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The one who listens attentively to the Word of God and truly prays, always asks the Lord: what is your will for me?
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The month of May, dedicated to Mary, is a fitting time to begin to recite the rosary daily.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Our mission as Christians is to conform ourselves evermore to Jesus as the model of our lives.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us ask the Holy Spirit for the grace to live daily according to the mind of Jesus and his Gospel.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for the miners who died in Turkey and for the latest victims of shipwreck in the Mediterranean.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us read the Gospel, a small section each day. This way we will learn what is most essential in our lives: love and mercy.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Our life has been saved by the blood of Christ. Let us always be renewed by this love.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text:
Let us all join in prayer for the immediate release of the schoolgirls kidnapped in Nigeria.
#BringBackOurGirls
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: A family enlightened by the Gospel provides a school for Christian living! There one learns faithfulness, patience and sacrifice.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Holiness means giving ourselves in sacrifice every day. And so married life is a tremendous path to sanctity!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: In our families we learn to love and to recognise the dignity of all, especially of the elderly.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: A society which abandons children and the elderly severs its roots and darkens its future.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: What does “evangelise” mean? To give witness with joy and simplicity to what we are and what we believe in.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Do not be afraid! Open the doors to Christ!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: No one is more patient than God the Father; no one understands and knows how to wait as much as he does.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I ask everyone with political responsibility to remember two things: human dignity and the common good.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Who among us can presume to be free of sin?  No one. Let us ask God to forgive our sins.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Inequality is the root of social evil.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: None of us can think we are exempt from concern for the poor and for social justice (EG 201).
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We must not let ourselves fall into the vortex of pessimism. Faith can move mountains!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: A simple lifestyle is good for us,  helping us to better share with those in need.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Each encounter with Jesus fills us with joy, with that deep joy which only God can give.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christ is risen!  Alleluia!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Please join me in praying for the victims of the ferry disaster in Korea and their families
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: It is not easy to follow Jesus closely, because the path he chooses is the way of the Cross.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Each encounter with Jesus changes our life.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Holy Week is a good occasion to go to confession and to take up the right path again.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How beautiful it is to stand before the Crucifix, simply to be under the Lord’s gaze, so full of love. (EG 264)
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Only trust in God can transform doubts into certainty, evil into good, night into radiant dawn.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Jesus teaches us to not be ashamed of touching human misery, of touching his flesh in our brothers and sisters who suffer. (EG 270)
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We need to rediscover a contemplative spirit, so that the love of God may warm our hearts.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How good it is for us when the Lord unsettles our lukewarm and superficial lives.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: In the Gospel we can hear Jesus speaking to us every day: may we always carry with us a small copy of the Gospel!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: With Jesus our life becomes full. With him everything makes sense. (EG 266)
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May we never get used to the poverty and decay around us. A Christian must act.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear parents, teach your children to pray. Pray with them.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Lent is a time to change direction, to respond to the reality of evil and poverty.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We live in a society that leaves no room for God; day by day this numbs our hearts.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We all need to improve, to change for the better. Lent helps us fight against our faults.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Lent is a time of grace, a time to convert and live out our baptism fully.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We cannot be tepid disciples.  The Church needs our courage in order to give witness to truth.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Jesus is never far from us sinners.  He wants to pour out on us, without limit, all of his mercy.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Jesus is our hope.  Nothing – not even evil or death – is able to separate us from the saving power of his love.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Sickness and death are not taboo subjects.  They are realities that we must face in Jesus’ presence.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May we learn to say “thank you” to God and to one another.  We teach children to do it, and then we forget to do it ourselves!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text:
I greet the World School Network for Encounter. 
Today we plant the first virtual olive tree for peace. @infoscholas
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christian love is loving without counting the cost.  This is the lesson of the Good Samaritan; this is the lesson of Jesus.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Thank you for all your warm wishes on my anniversary. Please continue praying for me.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Please pray for me.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The challenge for Christian spouses:remaining together, knowing how to love one another always, and doing so in a way that their love grows.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Our deepest joy comes from Christ: remaining with him, walking with him, being his disciples.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for Christians who are victims of persecution, so that they may know how to respond to evil with good.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Lent is a good time for sacrificing.  Let us deny ourselves something every day to help others.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: In life we all make many mistakes. Let us learn to recognize our errors and ask forgiveness.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How to live a good marriage? United to the Lord, who always renews our love and strengthens it to overcome every difficulty.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us thank all those who teach in Catholic schools. Educating is an act of love; it is like giving life.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Eucharist is essential for us: it is Christ who wishes to enter our lives and fill us with his grace.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: In a family it is normal to take charge of those who need help. Do not be afraid of frailty!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: All of us who are baptized are missionary disciples. We are called to become a living Gospel in the world.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Our Lady is always close to us, especially when we feel the weight of life with all its problems.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us never lose hope! God loves us always, even with our mistakes and sins.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Confirmation is important for Christians; it strengthens us to defend the faith and to spread the Gospel courageously.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Lord Jesus, make us capable of loving as you love.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us learn from Christ how to pray, to forgive, to sow peace, and to be near those in need.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To all who are sick, do not lose hope, especially when your suffering is at its worst.  Christ is near you.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for peace in Africa, especially in the Central African Republic and in South Sudan. #prayforpeace
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, don’t be afraid to marry.  A faithful and fruitful marriage will bring you happiness.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for seminarians, that they may listen to the voice of the Lord and follow it with courage and joy.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I greet all those who are sick and suffering.  Christ Crucified is with you; cling to him!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Today I ask you to join me in prayer for His Holiness Benedict XVI, a man of great courage and humility.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for all good and faithful priests who dedicate themselves to their people with generosity and unknown sacrifices.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Sacraments, especially Confession and the Eucharist, are privileged places of encountering Christ.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: What zest life acquires when we allow ourselves to be filled by the love of God!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The world makes us look towards ourselves, our possessions, our desires.The Gospel invites us to be open to others, to share with the poor.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, Jesus gives us life, life in abundance. If we are close to him we will have joy in our hearts and a smile on our face.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: It is important to have friends we can trust. But it is essential to trust the Lord, who never lets us down.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May the World Day of Consecrated Life be a timely occasion to rediscover the centrality of Jesus in our lives.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Sometimes we are saddened by the weight of our sins. May we not be discouraged. Christ has come to lift this burden and give us peace.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: No one saves oneself. The community is essential.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I cannot imagine a Christian who does not know how to smile. May we joyfully witness to our faith.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for Christian unity. There are so many beautiful things which unite us
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, let us not be satisfied with a mediocre life. Be amazed by what is true and beautiful, what is of God!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: It is easy to ask God for things; we all do it. When will we also learn to give him thanks and to adore him?
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We are called to live our baptism every day, as new creatures, clothed in Christ.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Like Mary, may we nurture the light born within us at Christmas. May we carry it everywhere in our daily lives.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I join the March for Life in Washington with my prayers. May God help us respect all life, especially the most vulnerable
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: If we live the faith in our daily life, then our work too becomes a chance to spread the joy of being a Christian.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: It is not enough to say we are Christians. We must live the faith, not only with our words, but with our actions.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Wars shatter so many lives. I think especially of children robbed of their childhood.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How powerful prayer is! May we never lose the courage to say: Lord, give us your peace.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for peace, and let us bring it about, starting in our own homes!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May we always say thank you to God, especially for his patience and mercy.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Lord is knocking at the door of our hearts. Have we put a sign on the door saying: “Do not disturb”?
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: No elderly person should be like an “exile” in our families. The elderly are a treasure for our society.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May we stop before the Child of Bethlehem and allow the tenderness of God to warm our hearts.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us contemplate the humility of the Son of God born into poverty. Let us imitate him by sharing with those who are weak.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us leave a spare place at our table: a place for those who lack the basics, who are alone.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear friends, I wish to thank you for the many kind Christmas greetings.  May the Lord bless you all!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, Jesus wants to be your friend, and wants you to spread the joy of this friendship everywhere.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Child Jesus reveals the tenderness of God’s immense love surrounding each one of us.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: God does not reveal himself in strength or power, but in the weakness and fragility of a newborn babe.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us draw from the crib the joy and deep peace that Jesus comes to bring to the world.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: In the face of the Child Jesus we contemplate the face of God. Come, let us adore him!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Our Mother Mary is full of beauty because she is full of grace.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May the joy of the Gospel be always in our hearts, especially this Christmas.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Before the Nativity scene, may we pray in a particular way for those suffering persecution for the faith.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christ comes among us at Christmas: it is the perfect time for a personal encounter with the Lord.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Lord is coming. May we await him with open hearts!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christmas celebrations are often full of sound. It would be good for us to make room for silence, to hear the voice of Love.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Advent is a journey towards Bethlehem. May we let ourselves be drawn by the light of God made man.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: This Christmas may we be consistent in living the Gospel, welcoming Jesus into the centre of our lives.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray that God grant us the grace of knowing a world where no one dies of hunger.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The love of God is not generic. God looks with love upon every man and woman, calling them by name.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We cannot resign ourselves to think of a Middle East without Christians.  Let us pray every day for peace.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: This is Christian hope: that the future is in God’s hands.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Don’t be afraid to go to the Sacrament of Confession, where you will meet Jesus who forgives you.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We cannot think of a Church without joy.  This is the joy of the Church: announcing to all the name of Jesus.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Mary, Our Mother, sustain us in moments of darkness, difficultly and apparent defeat.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: If we see someone who needs help, do we stop? There is so much suffering and poverty, and a great need for good Samaritans.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, put your talents at the service of the Gospel, with creativity and boundless charity.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The cross is the price of true love. Lord, give us the strength to accept and carry our crosses!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Holiness doesn’t mean doing extraordinary things, but doing ordinary things with love and faith.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Fifty years ago, Vatican II spoke of communications. Let us listen to, dialogue with, and bring to Christ all those we encounter in life.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We are all called to be friends with Jesus. Don’t be afraid to love the Lord.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Your sins are great? Just tell the Lord: Forgive me, help me to get up again, change my heart!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Church invites everyone to be embraced by the Father’s tenderness and forgiveness.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: It is hard to forgive others. Lord, grant us your mercy, so that we can always forgive.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let’s try to be open to God’s word, and open to the Lord’s surprises when he speaks to us.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Church is missionary. Christ sends us forth to bring the joy of the Gospel to the whole world.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To live charitably means not looking out for our own interests, but carrying the burdens of the weakest and poorest among us.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Sacraments are Jesus Christ’s presence in us.  So it is important for us to go to Confession and receive Holy Communion.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Kingdom of Heaven is for those who place their trust in the love of God, not in material possessions.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: To be saints is not a privilege for the few, but a vocation for everyone.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Saints were not superhuman.  They were people who loved God in their hearts, and who shared this joy with others.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Confessing our sins may be difficult for us, but it brings us peace.  We are sinners, and we need God’s forgiveness.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Jesus kept his wounds so that we would experience his mercy.  This is our strength and our hope.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young people, always be missionaries of the Gospel, every day and in every place.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Take care of God’s creation.  But above all, take care of people in need.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We remember the Philippines, Vietnam and the entire region hit by Typhoon Haiyan. Please be generous with prayers and concrete help.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: God loves us.  May we discover the beauty of loving and being loved.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Our life must be centred on what is essential, on Jesus Christ.  Everything else is secondary.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I ask all of you to join me in prayer for the victims of Typhoon Haiyan / Yolanda especially those in the beloved islands of the Philippines
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Year of Faith is about to end.  Lord, in this graced moment, help us to take the Gospel seriously.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Saints are people who belong fully to God.  They are not afraid of being mocked, misunderstood or marginalized.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We need courage if we are to be faithful to the Gospel.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I thank all missionaries, men and women who quietly work hard for the Lord and their brothers and sisters.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The fight against evil is long and difficult.  It is essential to pray constantly and to be patient.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Christians know how to face difficulties, trials and defeat with serenity and hope in the Lord.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: If money and material things become the center of our lives, they seize us and make us slaves
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: We are all sinners. But God heals us with an abundance of grace, mercy and tenderness.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear Followers I understand there are now over 10 million of you! I thank you with all my heart and ask you to continue praying for me
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Too often we participate in the globalization of indifference. May we strive instead to live global solidarity.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The “throw-away” culture produces many bitter fruits, from wasting food to isolating many elderly people.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Being a Christian means renouncing ourselves, taking up the cross and carrying it with Jesus.  There is no other way.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us pray for peace: peace in the world and in each of our hearts.

text: Dear young friends, it is worth wagering one’s life on Christ and on the Gospel, risking everything for great ideals! #Rio2013 #JMJ
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Now, young friends, we must continue to live day by day all that we have professed together at WYD.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: What an unforgettable week in Rio!  Thank you, everyone.  Pray for me. #Rio2013 #JMJ
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I am back home, and I assure you that my joy is much greater than my exhaustion!
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I profoundly thank all those who have worked to make WYD a success and I embrace all of you who were present. #Rio2013 #JMJ
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Every Friday is an opportunity to remember how much Jesus has suffered for us.  Lord, never let us forget how much you love us.

user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The measure of the greatness of a society is found in the way it treats those most in need, those who have nothing apart from their poverty.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: May sports always be a means of exchange and growth, never of violence and hate. #Rio2013 #JMJ
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Let us thank Blessed John Paul II for WYD and for the many vocations born during these 28 gatherings. #Rio2013 #JMJ
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Never forget, young friends:  The Virgin Mary is our Mother and with her help we can remain faithful to Christ. #Rio2013 #JMJ
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: The Church is young, as everyone can see at WYD.  May the Lord always keep us all young at heart. #Rio2013 #JMJ

text: Thank you to all of you and to all the authorities for a magnificent welcome in Rio. #Rio2013 #JMJ
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Today we begin a wonderful week in Rio; may it be a time to deepen our friendship in Jesus Christ.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: I am arriving in Brazil in a few hours and my heart is already full of joy because soon I will be with you to celebrate the 28th WYD.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: How many wish to be in Rio for WYD but can’t!  May they feel at one with us in prayer.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Dear young friends, I know that many of you are still travelling to Rio.  May the Lord accompany you on your way.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: Many of you have already arrived in Rio and many more are just arriving.  We will see one another there in only three days.
user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text:
Sometimes we know what we have to do, but we lack the courage to do it.
Let us learn from Mary how to make decisions, trusting in the Lord.

text:
The world tells us to seek success, power and money;
God tells us to seek humility, service and love.

user_description: Welcome to the official Twitter page of His Holiness Pope Francis

text: It would be a good idea, during May, for families to say the Rosary together.  Prayer strengthens family life.

text: My thoughts turn to all who are unemployed, often as a result of a self-centred mindset bent on profit at any cost.

text: Dear young friends, learn from Saint Joseph. He went through difficult times, but he always trusted, and he knew how to overcome adversity.

text: Let us put our trust in God’s power at work!  With him, we can do great things.  He will give us the joy of being his disciples.

text: The Holy Spirit truly transforms us.  With our cooperation, he also wants to transform the world we live in.

text:

that God will grant comfort and strength to their families

text: Dear young people, do not bury your talents, the gifts that God has given you!  Do not be afraid to dream of great things!

text: True power is service.  The Pope must serve all people, especially the poor, the weak, the vulnerable.
